description: This weekend, all Xbox players on Series X and S consoles can jump into EA's latest UFC 5 fighting game without needing any Game Pass subscription. Read more...
title: EA Sports UFC 5 is free-to-play on Xbox Series X|S this weekend

description: Microsoft has a new update for Windows 11 23H2 and 22H2 users with KB5060826. This is an optional update. Read more...
title: Windows 11 KB5060826 optional update brings better Setup, new data migration tool, more

description: Microsoft is rolling out a hefty Windows 11 update with small taskbar icons, a new PC Migration tool, and numerous other enhancements. Read more...
title: Windows 11 gets resizable taskbar icons, PC Migration tool, and more in KB5060829

description: SK hynix P41 Gen4 as well as WD_BLACK SN8100 NVMe SSDs are currently discounted, making them nice deals for sure. Read more...
title: 4TB 2TB WD_BLACK SN8100 Gen5 NVMe 2280 SSDs are nice deals for sure

description: One of the hardware requirements for Windows 11 is Secure Boot, and its certificates are expiring soon. Here is what you need to know about that. Read more...
title: Certificates for one of Windows 11's hardware requirements expire soon, here is what to know

description: Last month, Google previewed Gemma 3n, an AI model optimized for mobile. Now, it's officially available for developers to test and build with. Read more...
title: Google releases Gemma 3n, a new AI model built for mobile devices

description: Insiders using Copilot in PowerPoint can now ask the AI assistant to generate a complete slide deck based on a PDF or text file for them in seconds. Read more...
title: A PDF or text file is all you need for Copilot to generate a PowerPoint for you in seconds

description: Right on schedule, Valve has kicked off the 2025 Steam Summer Sale. The promotion is offering discounts on almost every game and DLC on the PC storefront. Read more...
title: Steam Summer Sale 2025 is here offering weeks of massive discounts for PC gamers

description: If you are someone who likes to try clothes virtually before buying, Google has launched a new app you might want to try. Read more...
title: Google launches Doppl, an app that lets you to try on new clothes without leaving your home

description: Google unveils AI Ultra for Business, its new Workspace add-on with advanced AI models and new creative tools. Read more...

description: YouTube has announced a set of AI-focused updates, the most notable being a feature that works like AI Overviews in Google Search. Read more...
title: YouTube adds AI summaries to search results and expands conversational AI testing

description: Google has rolled out a brand new AI function in Sheets, which allows for text generation for summaries, sentiment analysis, and more. Similar capabilities are not present in Copilot for Excel yet. Read more...
title: Google Sheets gets exciting Gemini feature that is still missing in Excel

description: Focus Entertainment has pushed out the next major update to Space Marine 2, and it has brought a horde mode with waves of enemies and boss fights, as well as new tech for PC gamers. Read more...

description: Microsoft has updated its Media Creation Tool with a newer Windows 11 version, which means fewer updates on clean installations. Read more...

description: Never miss a detail with My Notes AI. Record and transcribe unlimited recordings and organize everything with advanced tools on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Read more...

description: Google Cloud partners are getting new tools powered by Gemini, built to help with things like analyzing Statements of Work and more. Read more...
title: Google Cloud announces new Gemini-powered tools to 'increase efficiency' for partners

description: After investing in nuclear power plants, Meta is now turning to renewable energy to power its data centers. Read more...
title: Meta is now using every possible source to power its data centers

description: Mozilla has released a small update for the Firefox browser to address crashes on startup and problems with dark themes. Read more...
title: Mozilla fixes Firefox crashes on startup and other issues

description: Windows 11 is getting new tools that will help minimize disruption and quickly recover when unexpected crashes or other outages occur. Read more...
title: Windows 11 is getting a redesigned BSOD and new tools to help you recover from outages

description: Google has announced a new Gemini AI kit for startups, loaded with tools and resources to get the ball rolling. Read more...
title: Google's latest Gemini trick is a free AI kit for startups

description: The 2021-released indie exploration title Sable is the latest PC game to become free on the Epic Games Store. Read more...

description: Dell has revealed its rather boring-sounding Dell 14 Premium and 16 Premium laptops. These are successors to the XPS laptops. Read more...
title: After ditching XPS branding, Dell unveils Premium laptops starting at $1,649

description: This free to download eBook bridges the gap between the current state of reality and the incredible potential of AI to change the world. Read more...
title: Download Using Artificial Intelligence to Save the World eBook (worth $30) for free

description: Ofcom has named several porn websites which have publicly committed to implementing age checks for UK visitors by 25 July. Among them, PornHub is the most well known. Read more...
title: PornHub commits to age checks for UK users by 25 July

description: Microsoft has shared a guide so that Windows 10 office PCs, that can not upgrade to Windows 11, can use ESU to extend their support period. Read more...
title: Microsoft shares Windows 10 ESU key guide for office PCs that don't support Windows 11

description: Microsoft has made major upgrades to Visual Studio with regard to the AI experiences offered in the popular development tool. Read more...
title: Visual Studio gets even smarter with more AI models and billing updates

description: Newegg is having a time-limited sale on the Synology DS923+ which brings it down to its lowest price in combination with a coupon. Read more...

description: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat is now rolling out to Government Community Cloud (GCC) tenants. It'll allow these users access on the Microsoft 365 Copilot app, Outlook, and Microsoft Teams. Read more...

description: After a long wait, Raycast is now available on Windows, bringing features that Mac users have enjoyed for some time. Read more...
title: Here's your first look at Raycast for Windows, now in beta

description: Microsoft has released the June 2025 security baseline update for Windows Server 2025 to help admins use the best configurations for their systems. Read more...
title: Windows Server 2025 security baseline to get more frequent updates, streamlines settings

description: Microsoft has announced Modern Page Templates for SharePoint which will help organizations speed up the creation of internal pages and news posts. They're due to roll out in July. Read more...
title: Microsoft SharePoint gets Modern Page Templates to speed up page creation

description: The upcoming Season 6 of Call of Duty: Mobile, called Gundams Arrive, will be available from July 2 at 5PM PT. It will introduce a new, limited-time mode. Read more...
title: Gundams to arrive in Call of Duty: Mobile with new mech mode and unique third-person combat

description: Microsoft has announced two of its Surface Copilot+ PCs will be available for the education sector starting from July 22 as Windows 10 EOL approaches. Read more...
title: Surface Copilot+ PCs coming to classrooms from July 22, turbocharged with on-device AI

title: Alienware 34 240Hz QD-OLED Monitor: A premium ultrawide for serious gamers - save $100!

description: As the release of Amarok 3.3 approaches, the second beta is now available for testing, featuring a new GStreamer backend, ReplayGain improvements, and more. Read more...
title: Amarok 3.3 Beta 2 replaces Phonon API with GStreamer
